help.update: updates Northstar from your set game path
help.novpupdates: overwrites viper.json and disables Viper updates
help.installmod: installs a mod, folder or zip

update.uptodate: Latest version (%s) is already installed, skipping update.

launch.linuxerror: Launching the game is not currently supported on Linux

gamepath.lost: Gamepath not found, make sure it's mounted!

mods.cantfind: Can't find a mod with that name!
mods.notamod: Selected folder/file is not a mod

update.available: A new update for Viper is available, do you want to restart and apply it?

mods.title: Mods

required.confirm: You've selected a core mod, Northstar may not function without it. Are you sure?

mods.dragdrop: Drag and drop a mod to install
mods.confirmdependencies: This package has dependencies, shown below, clicking "Ok" will install the package and the dependencies.
mods.confirm_plugins_title: The following package has native plugins:
mods.confirm_plugins_description: Native plugins have far more system access than a regular mod, and because of this they're inherently less secure to have installed, as a malicious plugin could do far more harm this way. If this plugin is one from a trusted developer or similar or you know what you're doing, then you can disregard this message completely.

nsargs.title: Launch options
nsargs.desc: Here you can add launch options for Northstar/Titanfall.

autolang.title: Auto-Detect Language
autolang.desc: When enabled, Viper tries to automatically detect your system language, when disabled you can manually change the language below.

forcedlang.title: Language
forcedlang.desc: When "Auto-Detect Language" is disabled, this will decide the language. Requires a restart to take effect.

autoupdate.title: Viper Auto-Updates
autoupdate.desc: Viper will automatically keep itself up-to-date.

nsupdate.title: Northstar Auto-Updates
nsupdate.desc: Viper will automatically keep Northstar up-to-date, however it can still manually be updated through the Northstar page.

excludes.title: Retain files on update
excludes.desc: When Northstar is updated, files specified here will not be overwritten by files from the new Northstar update, unless you know what you're changing, you should probably not change anything here. Each file is separated with a space.

originkill.title: Automatically quit Origin and or EA Desktop
originkill.desc: When Viper exits, automatically quit Origin and or EA Desktop as well.

gaming.title: Northstar update available!
gaming.body:
An update for Northstar is available.
You can force its installation after closing the game.

gamepath.must: The game path must be set to start Viper.
gamepath.wrong: This folder is not a valid game path.
gamepath.lost:
Gamepath no longer exists/can't be found!

Make sure your drive is mounted properly, or if you moved your game location that you update the game path.

Viper may not work properly until next restart!

desc.malformed: has an incorrect folder structure, if you're the developer, you should fix this.
desc.failed: An unknown error occurred while trying to install the mod. This may be the author's fault, and it may also be Viper's fault.
desc.duped: has multiple mod folders in it, with the same name, causing duplicate folders, if you're the developer, you should fix this.
desc.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, click for more details. You may want to take a screenshot of the detailed error when filing a bug report.

autoupdates.gamerunning: Game is running, refusing to update Northstar

general.missingpath: Game location could not be found automatically! Please select it manually!
general.invalidconfig:
Your config file is improperly formatted, if it's been manually edited, please validate that everything is typed correctly.

If you did not manually edit the config file, it is recommended to simply reset the config.

To reset your config file simply click "Ok" below.

More details:

viper.noReleaseNotes:
Couldn't fetch Viper release notes.
Try again later!

northstar.noReleaseNotes:
Couldn't fetch Northstar release notes.
Try again later!
